name: Goldfinch
description: Invest USDC for real yields, from real businesses. Goldfinch's stablecoin returns come from lending to successful credit funds and fintechs in emerging markets, with loans fully collateralized off-chain by real-world assets. Goldfinch offers crypto lenders access to successful emerging market debt deals which have been historically inaccessible outside of exclusive networks, while expanding access to cost-efficient crypto financing that doesn't require crypto collateral.

name: AAVE
description: Aave is an Open Source Protocol to create Non-Custodial Liquidity Markets to earn interest on supplying and borrowing assets with a variable or stable interest rate. The protocol is designed for easy integration into your products and services.

name: Irys
description: Irys is the first L1 programmable datachain, bringing together data storage and execution for a simpler and more efficient development process. Built for scalability, Irys supports both temporary and permanent data, ensuring reliable and flexible data management. With a clear pricing model and EVM compatibility, Irys offers a solid and affordable platform for creating dynamic, data-driven applications. Irys bridges the gap between temporary and permanent data, ensuring efficient and verifiable onchain interactions. Our mission is to lead the transition to a fully onchain, data-driven future, setting a new standard for web services and empowering innovation at every step.

name: Arweave
description: The Arweave web wallet lets you deploy permanent data from the browser, connect your accounts securely to decentralized applications, and navigate the weave
